entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
